snippet: Supporters of the University of North Dakota’s Fighting Sioux nickname turned in about 16,000 signatures to cap a petition drive to force a statewide vote on a moniker the N.C.A.A. says is insulting to American Indians.
abstract: Supporters of the University of North Dakota's Fighting Sioux nickname cap a petition drive to force a statewide vote on the moniker, which the NCAA contends is insulting to American Indians.
lead_paragraph: Supporters of the University of North Dakota’s Fighting Sioux nickname turned in about 16,000 signatures to cap a petition drive to force a statewide vote on a moniker the N.C.A.A. says is insulting to American Indians.

headline.main: Nickname Could Be Up for a Vote
headline.print_headline: Nickname Could Be Up for a Vote
